sentences.en: A: copy only files with the Archive attribute set.
sentences.cn: 复制唯一文件以档案属性集合.

sentences.en: an archive of the writer’s unpublished work
sentences.cn: 那位作家未发表作品的档案

sentences.en: Be responsible for archive any documents in production department.
sentences.cn: 负责生产部门内的所有文件的归档.

sentences.en: Be responsible to keep and archive records and documents relating to purchasing.
sentences.cn: 负责与采购相关各类记录凭证的保管,存档.

sentences.en: Copies of these messages may be in the archive.
sentences.cn: 这些信息拷贝或许存档.

sentences.en: In a separate archive is the official localization and universal activator.
sentences.cn: 在单独的存档是正式的本地化和普遍激活.

sentences.en: In fact, it presupposes an excellent legal archive or law library.
sentences.cn: 事实上, 很可能存在一所完备的法律文件档案室或法学图书馆.

sentences.en: Infected files in archive will not be deleted or repaired!
sentences.cn: 文档文件里的被感染文件将不能被删除或修复!

sentences.en: Marxism reveals the logical core of archive information multiplication.
sentences.cn: 马克思主义揭示了档案信息增值的合理内核.

sentences.en: Receive and archive the production documentation , including the Batch Record and COA.
sentences.cn: 及时准确接收、存入各种与生产有关原始记录.

sentences.en: She went to the city archive this morning.
sentences.cn: 她今天上午去了市档案馆。

sentences.en: The repository is the official archive of our work.
sentences.cn: 库是我们的正式的档案.

sentences.en: This vast archive has been indexed and made accessible to researchers.
sentences.cn: 这个存量巨大的档案室的所有文件都已编了索引，可供研究人员使用。

sentences.en: To see any past APOD, access the archive page.
sentences.cn: 要想看任何一张过去的APOD图, 进入存档页.

sentences.en: What are the unique benefits of the ARCHIVE storage engine?
sentences.cn: ARCHIVE存储引擎唯一的好处是什么 呢 ?

sentences.en: What is the requirement for using Archive Bit mode?
sentences.cn: 为什么需要使用文档位备份?

words.tran_cn: 案卷保管人；档案保管员

trans.tran_en: a place where a large number of historical records are stored, or the records that are stored
to put documents, books, information etc in an archive
to put documents, books, information etc in an archive
